Text.Language: Ououwini pe V]: efsop qen piouwini: hanaggeloc n~ouwini: e~terhumnoc e~rof.
God is light, He abides in light, and the angels of light, sing unto Him.

Apiouwini sai: e~bol qen Maria: a~Elicabet mici: m~pip~rodromoc.
The light has shone, from Mary, and Elizabeth gave birth, to the forerunner.
